import { useState } from "react"; import LineChart from './components/LineChart' import { UserData } from './Data' import {Line} from "react-chartjs-2"; import React from "react"; import "./Home.css"; function Home() { // Input Values for the Graph const [title, setTitle] = useState(''); const [body, setBody] = useState(''); const [author, setAuthor] = useState('mario'); // Weight line graph const [userData, setUserData] = useState({ labels: UserData.map((data) => data.date), datasets: [ { label: "Weight (lbs)", data: UserData.map((data) => data.weight), borderColor: "rgba(255, 99, 132,0.5)", borderWidth:2, backgroundColor: "rgba(255, 99, 132,0.5)" }, { label: "Calories Consumed", data: UserData.map((data) => data.caloriesConsumed), borderColor: "rgb(100, 200, 235,0.3)", borderWidth:2, fill: true, backgroundColor: "rgb(100, 200, 235, 0.5)" }, { label: "Calories Burned ", data: UserData.map((data) => data.caloiresBurned ), borderColor: "rgb(53, 162, 235, 0.5)", borderWidth:2, fill: true, backgroundColor: "rgb(53, 162, 235, 0.5)" }, ], }); return( <>

Welcome to Bruinfit

Welcome to Bruinfit

Update Fitness Summary
setTitle(e.target.value)} />
Your Fitness Summary
); } export default Home ;
